name: Da Nang Home Cooking Class
description: Da Nang Home Cooking Class is a must to do in Da Nang if you spend your weekend or holiday in this beautiful city. This is a great opportunity to learn about Vietnamese cuisine and culture at a local house. Katie, who will teach you how to cook Vietnamese food is a young beautiful lady with large knowledge about Vietnamese food, culture and lifestyle. She won’t just give you step by step instruction about how to make the food but also give you an insight into local’s life. She knows many recipe secrets that have handed down from her family generations.
